name: Bean Cake Sandwich (Paula Deen)
ingredients: 3 cups leftover cooked white beans (can use canned hopefully with a ham hock flavor)
instructions: In a bowl, coarsely mash beans with a fork and add flour until well combined.
Melt butter and oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add patties and brown on both sides, till crispy.
Spread mayo on bread, top with patty and onions.
